Hi! In general, most women are able to continue a regular practice through month eight if they avoid twists below the neck, core activation and anything on the belly. Most will find they will know when something isn't right. Hip openers are good but go easier in third trimester. Modify core breaks with reclined cobbler's pose, modify belly stuff with child's pose or yogi's squat and modify standing twists with wide-legged forward fold. 

As always, consult your doctor/physician before starting and follow their advice. xx
